name: Know & Tell (with ads)
description:
Start genuine conversations and create lasting memories!

The fun never stops as you get to know what your family and friends really think and feel!

Start playing the Know & Tell game by choosing your favorite category.

Answer silly, formidable, and brilliant questions with friends!

Unravel your mind and give authentic responses.

You have the option to use your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch to audio or video record your answers - even share your recording on Social Media or play online!

Review your answers - why in the world did you say that?!

A great way to start genuine conversations and get to know each other.
